description: This file contains test cases for verifying structured responses from an AI agent, including models for movie scripts and recipes with enum ratings.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a movie script with fields for setting, ending, genre, name, characters, storyline, and rating.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a recipe with a name and a rating which is an enum.

classes.name: Grade
classes.description: An enum representing possible ratings for a recipe, including A+, A, B, C, D, and F.

methods.name: test_structured_response_with_integer_field
methods.description: Test case that verifies the response contains a rating field of type Dict for a movie script.

methods.name: test_structured_response_with_enum_fields
methods.description: Test case that verifies the response contains a rating of enum type Grade and a recipe name string.
